name: redolence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of smelling strongly of something or of having qualities (especially smells) that make you think of something else: The faint redolence of cigar smoke hung on his clothes. I can still feel and smell the redolence of the atmosphere. See
redolent
More examplesFewer examplesthe faint redolence of whisky fumesShe inhaled his musky redolence.the all-pervading redolence of incense
